en_text: and the people would open their eyes.
jp_text: 教主は健在だ

en_text:
I can't say for sure if it's
the same guy who Ed fought, though.
jp_text:
それがエドの倒した教主と
同一人物かどうかは分からんが
google_translated:
It is the edition of Ed
I do not know if it is the same person

en_text:
You think you should send Ed in,
to investigate?
jp_text: そう思わせておけばいい

en_text:
Ed believes he saved that town.
It's one of the first successes he had.
jp_text:
あいつは
１つの町を救ったと思っている
google_translated:
Aya
I think I saved one town

en_text:
we can't ask him to keep
this little guy, too.
jp_text: こいつまで頼むわけにはいかないさ
google_translated: I can not help but ask for this guy

en_text: Yeah. I know.
jp_text: そうだね…

en_text:
I'm sorry, Al. It's just
the best we can do.
jp_text: ごめんな　今は これだけで

en_text: So, isn't it about time you told me?
jp_text: これは 視察じゃあるまい

en_text:
I know you didn't all
come here to observe us.
jp_text: そろそろ 教えてもらえるかな
google_translated: I wonder if I can tell you soon

en_text:
There have already been five
officer slayings in Central.
jp_text: セントラルだけで 既に５人…

en_text:
You won't win! They'll find you!
You're a barbarian, nothing more!
jp_text: うっ！ うう…

en_text: Time to head East.
jp_text: イーストシティ…

en_text: Fullmetal Alchemist.
jp_text: 「鋼の錬金術師」

en_text: Episode 14: Destruction's Right Hand
jp_text: 第14話「破壊の右手」

en_text:
I don't care about your cause, even if
it's vengeance on all State Alchemists.
jp_text:
たとえ 全ての国家錬金術師が
敵だとしても
google_translated:
Every national alchemist
Even if it is an enemy

en_text: I won't let you kill my brother.
jp_text: 兄さんだけは殺させはしない！
